item.title: Video Editor for Motorcycle Ride Footage - Upwork
item.description:
Description: We are looking for a skilled video editor to help create engaging videos from footage of two motorcycle rides: one in Vietnam and another in Tasmania. The client is a passionate 50-year-old Australian motorcyclist who wants to showcase his adventures through compelling video stories.

Responsibilities:

Edit multiple individual videos and pictures into concise, cohesive narratives.
Seamlessly combine footage to create two distinct videos: one for the Vietnam motorcycle ride and another for the Tasmania motorcycle ride.
Ensure the videos are engaging and reflect the client's love for motorcycling.
Select and incorporate suitable music that complements the motorcycle theme (something snappy and energetic).
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, especially in creating compelling narratives from raw footage.
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Ability to work with multiple sources of media and deliver high-quality outputs.
Understanding of pacing, storytelling, and visual aesthetics.
Excellent communication skills and responsiveness.
Additional Information:

Maximum video length: 15 minutes per video.
Flexibility on project timelines; open to discussion if more time is needed.
How to Apply: Please include examples of previous video editing work that demonstrates your storytelling and editing skills. Also, let us know your availability and estimated timeline for completing both videos.

We look forward to hearing from talented video editors who can bring these motorcycle adventures to life!


Posted On: June 17, 2024 09:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Product Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there! I have 3 video's for products that need a bit more interesting editing, and need the current text to be translated from english into Dutch (you can use a translate tool for this). This project is a test, after this I have about 20 product video's that need editing, and after that I need a part time editor (20hr per week) to edit instagram reeels and tiktok videos

I've attached the video's that need to be edited and named them video #1, #2, #3 and added 1 example video of a video I think looks really good.

comments:
For video #2, please delete the logo on the product on the right bottom corner, use a magic erase function for this so it does not look like the logo is there.
For video #3, erase the logo as well.

Anything unclear? please contact me!

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 17, 2024 09:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Copywriting
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Copywriting
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Animator for YouTube Videos in Iman Gadzhi Style - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative animator to join our team for a long-term collaboration. The primary task is to create engaging animations for YouTube videos that closely mimic the style of Iman Gadzhi.

The ideal candidate will have experience in creating dynamic and visually appealing animations, with a preference for those who can work with Dutch talking head videos (I can translate it if needed).

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with the creative director to understand the animation requirements and style.
- Create animations for YouTube videos, ensuring they align with Iman Gadzhi's style.
- Work with raw video edits provided by us to add animations.
- Ensure timely delivery of animations for weekly video releases.
- Maintain consistent quality and style across all videos.
- Adapt to feedback and make necessary revisions promptly.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as an animator, with a portfolio showcasing your work.
- Ability to mimic the animation style of Iman Gadzhi.
- Proficiency in animation software (e.g., Adobe After Effects, Blender, etc.).
- Experience working with talking head videos, preferably in Dutch.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Good communication skills to collaborate effectively with the creative team.
- Availability to work on at least one 10-minute YouTube video per week.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience with Dutch language videos.
- Previous work experience in creating YouTube content.
- Familiarity with current animation trends and techniques.

Application Process:

If you are passionate about animation and want to be part of a growing YouTube channel, we would love to hear from you! Please provide the following:

- A link to your portfolio or examples of previous work.
- A brief description of your experience and why you would be a good fit for this role.
- Your availability and preferred package for a 10-minute video.
- Any additional information you think is relevant.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 09:03 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Video Editing, Animation, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Animation, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Edit Trailer Video - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:

We are seeking an experienced video editor to edit a video trailer for the latest update of our Unreal Engine asset, the Low Poly Shooter Pack. The trailer will be approximately 2 minutes long, though we are open to suggestions regarding its length. The goal is to create a good-looking and engaging trailer that effectively promotes our product and drives traffic to our Gumroad page.

Responsibilities:

- Edit the video trailer based on provided footage.
- Review and improve upon previous trailers created by our team.
- Offer suggestions for additional footage if necessary.
- Design professional and attractive text overlays.
- Select and sync music with video transitions.
- Structure the trailer content to maximize excitement and engagement.
- Create visually appealing elements to highlight "available on Gumroad."
- Ensure the trailer engages the audience throughout.

Requirements:

- Strong understanding of video editing principles, including text overlay design, music selection, and content structuring.
- Experience with creating promotional video content, preferably for game assets or similar products.

Project Details:

- The trailer is for the Low Poly Shooter Pack, an Unreal Engine asset available on the Unreal Engine Marketplace: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/low-poly-fps-pack
- Previous trailers for reference:
  - Trailer 1: https://youtu.be/HZWLHdWuPeQ?si=E0cmo_qAzHdENTVf
  - Trailer 2: https://youtu.be/p25V81Ues8I?si=zCu4bgogV8BBPNKi
- All necessary footage has been filmed, but additional footage can be captured if needed.

Key Objectives:

- Create a trailer that is visually appealing and engaging.
- Ensure the trailer effectively promotes the Gumroad link and free demo download.

Application Process:

Please provide examples of previous work, particularly any promotional videos or trailers you have created. Once we have discussed the project further, I will share a Google Drive link containing the footage for the trailer.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 17, 2024 08:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Trailer
Skills: Video Editing, Trailer
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: 🎨✨Creative Content Creators Needed: UGC, TikTok, Meta & AI Content Specialist + - Upwork
item.description:
Join Our Creative Revolution!

Are you a content creator who excels in crafting high-converting, data-driven content? Lotus Creative Agency is seeking elite talents who thrive in producing captivating UGC, TikTok reels, Meta platform content, and AI-enhanced visuals. If you have a knack for creating content that not only engages but deeply connects and converts, we want you on our team.

About Us:
Lotus Creative Agency is where innovation meets storytelling. We lead the digital narrative through compelling content, pushing the boundaries of digital marketing. Join our dynamic team and be a part of this creative revolution.

Your Role:
- UGC Creation: Develop authentic, engaging user-generated content that builds vibrant communities.
- TikTok Content Production: Create viral, trend-setting TikTok content that elevates brand stories and boosts engagement.
- Meta Platforms Content: Craft stunning reels and posts for Facebook and Instagram, optimizing for maximum impact.
- AI-Enhanced Content: Leverage AI tools to create unique, efficient, and cutting-edge content.
- Content Calendar Management: Develop and maintain a content calendar to ensure a consistent and strategic posting schedule.
- YouTube Channel Management: Produce, edit, and optimize videos for YouTube, ensuring they reach and engage the right audience.
- Video Editing and Repurposing: Edit and repurpose content across multiple platforms to maximize reach and engagement.

We're Searching For:
- Proven Track Record: Excellence in content creation for UGC, TikTok, Meta platforms, and AI-driven projects.
- Captivating Portfolio: A showcase of your ability to produce clean, engaging, high-quality reels and designs.
- Innovative Mindset: Use of AI tools in content creation, pushing the envelope of digital storytelling.
- Detail-Oriented: Passionate about creating content that engages audiences and generates leads.
- Collaborative Spirit: Exceptional communication and teamwork skills.
- Organizational Skills: Ability to manage content calendars and maintain a consistent posting schedule.
- Technical Proficiency: Expertise in video editing software and tools for creating high-quality, repurposable content.

What We Offer:
- Remote, Dynamic Work Environment: Work from anywhere while being part of a creative, innovative team.
- Diverse, Challenging Projects: Opportunities to work on various projects that challenge your creativity.
- Growth-Oriented Culture: A nurturing environment that values every idea and encourages personal and professional growth.
- Competitive Compensation: Attractive salary and benefits, recognizing your talent and hard work.

Please specify which content style you excel in and include examples of your best work.

Best Brand/Channel Content Examples for Reference: We are very heavly focused on reels/shorts and data-driven, emotion/attention grabbing content with value and or entertainment aspects.  
___________________
Personal Brand Content:
- Matt Grey's YouTube Channel: https://youtube.com/@realmattgray?si=HplKXl5BCM4NAXr0)
- Alex Hormozi's YouTube Channel: https://youtube.com/@alexhormozi?si=LCK9ib-fteS1slI1
- Example Video: https://youtu.be/uFhQOl9JDWo?si=7tt08aQWFU7nmi1K

___________________
Festival & Entertainment Content: Quick Hire!
- Bolt Motivation: https://youtube.com/@boltmotivationofficial?si=5PwHwg0Xjbg7enoW
- Music Realms: https://youtube.com/@musicrealms?si=nn2d8vXButTbQ3FC
- Soul Religion Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/soulreligion?igsh=dDMxNzFyaTdmdGgz
- Example Shorts: https://youtube.com/shorts/IX_lis7W-Vk?si=dMZ5ITMSszSoH5uw
- Music Media Co: https://youtube.com/@musicmediaco?si=BV7ru3iYRdSlYfDT
- Example Shorts: https://youtube.com/shorts/0TwH6TBgMK4?si=2pozbrQcvrKSln-u
- Drake and Rick Ross Beef: https://youtube.com/shorts/9WBjcCQpn-E?si=qB04I0hGpm17sxTV

___________________
Agency Content:
- Agency Example: https://youtube.com/shorts/6_IhR9u9_s8?si=nNm6i9dlEE4FtlSy

___________________
Driving School/Educational Content:
- Driving Friend: https://youtube.com/@driving_friend?si=ep5yncnhE5Ofb9O7

**Let's shape the future of digital content together!**

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 17, 2024 08:37 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Influencer Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Audience Research, Campaign Setup, Community Management, Video Advertising, Education, Media & Entertainment, Creative Writing, Search Engine Optimization
Skills: Influencer Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Audience Research, Campaign Setup, Community Management, Video Advertising, Education, Media & Entertainment, Creative Writing, Search Engine Optimization

item.title: TickTok Short video creator recruitment - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

We are looking for ticktok short video producers
Budge: $35

The requirements are as follows:
1. Duration: 30-45 seconds
2. Don't just show the unpacking process, focus on sharing and giving the audience real shopping feedback. Don't make the audience feel that the video is an advertisement for the business
3. Show and introduce each part of the product separately and use it in various scenarios
5. We need to provide multi-lens shooting to facilitate our post-editing, and the time for switching shots is greater than 3 seconds
6. Just give me the original video, you don't need to upload it to ticktok
7. Portrait, 9:16 ratio

Template: Opening speech (Hello everyone, recently I want to share xxx) -- reasons for purchase -- introduction of product overview -- analysis of reasons for liking the product -- multi-angle, multi-scene, multi-situation use -- Share your own evaluation, ideas, views -- Recommend to the audience

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $35
Posted On: June 17, 2024 08:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply
